product_name: Big Agnes Encampment Sleeping Bag - Men's Short - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cold weather is no match for the Big Agnes Encampment Men's Short Sleeping Bag. It delivers cozy warmth and has plenty of room so you can enjoy a good night's sleep in the backcountry. Bag has a temperature rating of 15degF for comfort in cold conditions; length accommodates sleepers up to 5 ft. 8 in. Underside insulation has been eliminated and replaced with a sleeve for a Big Agnes 20 in. wide rectangular pad (not included). Modified mummy bag features short staple synthetic insulation with 97% recycled content that provides high loft, superior warmth-to-weight ratio and excellent compressibility. A-Flex(TM) construction increases loft and maximizes heat retention by combining layers of "flexed" insulation with smaller "anchor" pieces. Ripstop nylon shell is treated with a durable water repellent finish; soft, breathable nylon taffeta lining cocoons you in comfort. Features a 2-way, full-length, locking zipper with big, easy-to-grab zipper pull. Create a pillow by stuffing a jacket or clothing into the built-in pillow sleeve, which keeps it in place all night long. Interior fabric loops stabilize a sleeping bag liner (not included). Draft tube located behind the zipper prevents warm air from escaping and cold air from entering. Big Agnes Encampment Men's Short Sleeping Bag includes a nylon stuff sack and cotton storage bag. Closeout.
